{{anglosaxon infobox | name=Gerard Manface | people=[[wikipedia:English people|Englishman]] | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position=Lawyer and Mountaineer | location= | affiliation=The [[Notion Club]] | language=[[wikipedia:English language|English]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse=Unknown wife | children=Many children | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} Sir '''Gerard Manface''' was a member of the [[Notion Club]]. == History == Sir Gerard Manface was educated at All Souls and became a lawyer by occupation. His main hobby was mountaineering and he was well traveled. He had many children, for whom he wrote many unpublished books and tales. He was a special friend of [[Philip Frankley]], though he was not resident in [[Oxford]] and seldom appeared at the [[Notion Club]].{{SD|2b}} == Genealogy == {{familytree/start}} {{familytree| GER |y| WIF |GER='''GERARD MANFACE'''
